# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="9b712-102">Agregar emojis o GIF en Outlook en la web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-102">Add emojis or GIFs in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="9b712-103">Responde a un correo electrónico existente o selecciona **nuevo mensaje**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9b712-104">Seleccionar la cara sonriente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="9b712-105">en la parte inferior de la ventana de redacción para abrir el panel expresiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9b712-106">Busque y seleccione el Emoji o GIF que desea insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9b712-107">Para obtener más información, vea [personalizar el mensaje de correo electrónico en Outlook en la web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9b712-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
